techmeme.title: How Spotify used its Perfect Fit Content program to rig its system against musicians, filling popular playlists with "ghost artists" to cut its royalty payouts (Liz Pelly/Harper's)
Shivakumar Venkataraman, a longtime Google executive who joined OpenAI earlier in 2024 to help lead the development of search and AI for enterprise, has left (The Information)
The US charges dual Russian and Israeli national Rostislav Panev for allegedly working with the LockBit ransomware group and seeks his extradition from Israel (Jamie Tarabay/Bloomberg)
o3, trained on the ARC-AGI-1 Public Training set, scored 87.5% on ARC Prize's Semi-Private Evaluation in a high-compute configuration; GPT-4o scored 5% in 2024 (ARC Prize)
OpenAI says safety researchers can sign up for o3 preview today and that it decided not to name the new model o2 "out of respect" for the UK telecom company (Bloomberg)
